When writing a financial contract, it is easy to make mistakes - costly mistakes that are usually irreversible on a blockchain. #Marlowe is a DSL designed to make it easy to write contracts that can be deployed on blockchains and avoid many of the common known mistakes!  https://t.co/Ow1L9fBlIg

Simon Thompson, Senior Research Fellow at IOHK, starts off the evening with an introduction on Marlowe. Marlowe provides a way for professionals in the finance industry who have no programming background to generate code and create software products. #Coinscrum #CardanoCommunity  https://t.co/LxKQPf0JPb
